title: Airline recruiting school students to train as pilots (Shanghai Municipal Government)
text: ( Source : Shanghai Municipal Government ) China Eastern Airlines is intensifying its efforts on recruiting high school talent as it tries to address long-term projections of pilot shortages in China . The Shanghai-based carrier plans to
